abstract: Steven A. Ballmer’s stance may force Yahoo’s next chief executive to find another way to revive the company’s profit.
snippet: Steven A. Ballmer’s stance may force Yahoo’s next chief executive to find another way to revive the company’s profit.
lead_paragraph: Steven A. Ballmer, chief executive of Microsoft, told shareholders on Wednesday that the company was no longer interested in acquiring Yahoo, setting off a 21 percent decline in Yahoo’s share price.

headline.main: Yahoo Bid Is Over, Microsoft Says
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Bid Is Over, Microsoft Says
